title: Fact Check: Did Sundar Pichai go to meet his school teacher? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video is being widely shared on social media with a claim that it features Google CEO Sundar Pichai. The video claims that Pichai is going to meet his school teacher after 26 years.

You can see the video here.

On looking closely we found that the viral video doing rounds does not feature Sundar Pichai but the person in the video is IC3 movement founder Ganesh Kohli.

In the above collage it is clear that, man on the left is Ganesh Kohli (from the video) and he looks no where close to Sundar Pichai (right).

Meanwhile, Ganesh Kohli himself took to twitter and clarified that his video is being shared with a false claim.

Hence we can conclude that this viral post is misleading.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
